Package gridsim.datagrid.storage

Classes that form the structure of Storage elements of a DataGrid resource.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Storage An interface which defines the desired functionality of a storage system in a Data Grid.
 

Class Summary
HarddriveStorage An implementation of a storage system.
TapeStorage An implementation of a tape storage system.
 

Package gridsim.datagrid.storage Description

Classes that form the structure of Storage elements of a DataGrid resource.
